Today in County Clare, it's looking great with 3 ft @ 12s WNW swell and light NNE winds at 6 mph. Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are prime spots, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @ 10s WNW with light SSW winds, making it a quiet day. Day after, conditions improve again with 4 ft @ 12s WNW swell and moderate NE winds, perfect for a surf session at spots like Doolin Point and Lahinch. Best: today.
